nodes.text: A shuttle was owned by the bounty hunter Tam Posla. When Chelli Aphra tricked Posla into thinking she had Doctor Cornelius Evazan captive, Posla agreed to give her the shuttle in return for Evazan. As Aphra attempted to escape Accresker Jail in the shuttle with Magna Tolvan, it was shot down by the assassin droids 0-0-0 and BT-1.
